page.title: 14Library
page.content: The library has got 11,000 books and 532 tapes. There are 7 partime employees and they have 1,800 readers. They do not like to call them customers. They work on Tuesday 3pm until 8pm, Thursday 9am until 8pm, Friday 2pm until 5pm and Saturday 9am until 1pm and then 2pm until 5.30pm. They have got books for all ages. The even have project books. Our school gets a box with a lot of book on 1 subject. You get about 30 to 40 books in the box and they are usually good ones. Some of our first and second years walk down to the library once a week. They go down to find out how it works and choose books.
